name: Poche Unions
description:
Fight against the deep sea monster to become the ever-triumph general!
The ocean is unfathomable. It looks peaceful on its surface, but it’s turbulent in the deep, because there is a monster. General, defeats it and keeps your record!
In Poche Unions:
- Choose your favorite character to fight with you. Collect more characters can let you become more powerful!
- Vivid scenes catch your eye. You would enjoy it as if you yourself fight against the monster!
- Discover the strongest team to defeat the monster!
- Numerous modes with numerous levels for you to challenge. Hurry to take them!
